person.persName: John O. Hodges (Harrison County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Eglantine Miller Hodges in Harrison County, Kentucky, on February 5, 1831. Father of John Hodges, Hawkins Hodges, and Isaac Hodges. Resident of Harrison County in 1840. Owned eight enslaved persons in Harrison County in 1840. Attorney in Harrison County in 1850. Owned thirteen enslaved persons in Bourbon County in 1850. Farmer in Cooper County, Missouri, in 1860. Owned eight enslaved persons in Cooper County in 1860. Attorney in Harrison County, Kentucky, in 1863.
